How to unlock Defeat Mystic Carrion

Defeat Mystic Carrion Rewards

If you defeat him, he drops "Staff of Cherished Necromancy" "Armor of the Sporekeeper" "Veil of the Morning" as well as a spell scroll and a key and a rusty key. Thrumbo then comes in and gives you a "Crypt Lord Ring" with has a level 6 create undead spell in it.
